table.name: equipment
table.description: This table acts as the equipment master for the system. It stores the information about all the equipments.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for equipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_XID
columns.description: The XID for the equipment type.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_NAME
columns.description: Text to describe the type of equipment. Examples include: CAR LOADS, TANKER, TRUCKS

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the equipment type.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL
columns.description: Typically this is a prefix or alphanumeric combination associated with the carrier Standard Carrier Alpha Code (SCAC) for the equipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_NUMBER
columns.description: The number assigned to the equipment and is entered to associate the number with the equipment initial.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: Equipment Initial and Number is a concatenation of the equipment initial and equipment number.

columns.name: OWNERSHIP_CODE
columns.description: Alpha-numeric code designating the status of the equipment (for example, leased or owned).

columns.name: OWNER_NAME
columns.description: Text for the name of the equipment owner.

columns.name: TAG1
columns.description: Tag fields, like attribute fields, are available to store additional information associated with this piece of equipment.

columns.name: TAG2
columns.description: Tag fields, like attribute fields, are available to store additional information associated with this piece of equipment.

columns.name: TAG3
columns.description: Tag fields, like attribute fields, are available to store additional information associated with this piece of equipment.

columns.name: TAG4
columns.description: Tag fields, like attribute fields, are available to store additional information associated with this piece of equipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_OWNER_TYPE
columns.description: The Type of Owner for this Equipment. C = Carrier Owned, L = Lessee, P = Private, A = All

columns.name: LESSEE_GID
columns.description: The SCAC for the Lessee of the Equipment.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT
columns.description: The empty weight of the equipment by itself.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure associated with the tare weight of the equipment.

columns.name: TARE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Tare weight of the equipment in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: AAR_CAR_TYPE
columns.description: The Association of American Railroads Car Type.

columns.name: DATE_BUILT
columns.description: The date this equipment was built.

columns.name: PURCH_DATE
columns.description: The purchase date of this equipment.

columns.name: REGISTRATION_NUM
columns.description: Registration number.

columns.name: REGISTRATION_DATE
columns.description: The date of the registration.

columns.name: LICENSE_PLATE
columns.description: The license plate number.

columns.name: LICENSE_STATE
columns.description: The license state.

columns.name: SIGHTING_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Sighting location of the equipment.

columns.name: SIGHTING_DATE
columns.description: Time of the sighting.

columns.name: PREV_SIGHTING_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Previous sighting location of the equipment.

columns.name: PREV_SIGHTING_DATE
columns.description: Time of the previous sighting.

columns.name: INTERCHANGE_RECV_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Interchange receive location of the equipment.

columns.name: INTERCHANGE_RECV_DATE
columns.description: Time of the interchange receive.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED2_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED3_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED4_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED5_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: INDICATOR
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: IS_CONTAINER
columns.description: Yes/No indicator for whether the equipment is a container.

columns.name: CURRENT_CHASSIS_INITIAL
columns.description: Initial of the current chassis.

columns.name: CURRENT_CHASSIS_NUMBER
columns.description: Number of the current chassis.

columns.name: LAST_OUTGATE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location where the equipment (chassis/container or trailer) was last outgated.

columns.name: LAST_OUTGATE_TIME
columns.description: Outgate time stamp at the outbound ramp.

columns.name: LAST_INGATE_TIME
columns.description: Ingate time stamp at the inbound ramp.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: PARK_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Park location of the equipment.

columns.name: UM_CHARGE
columns.description: UMLER Mileage Charge.

columns.name: UM_CHARGE_CURR_GID
columns.description: UMLER Mileage Charge Currency.

columns.name: UM_CHARGE_BASE
columns.description: UMLER Mileage Charge Base Amount.

columns.name: UM_CHARGE_UNIT
columns.description: UMLER Mileage Charge Unit (example, 2).

columns.name: UM_CHARGE_UNIT_BASE
columns.description: UMLER Mileage Charge Unit in Base UOM.

columns.name: UM_CHARGE_UNIT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: UMLER Mileage Charge Unit (example, Mile).

columns.name: AAR_MECH_DESIG
columns.description: AAR Mechanical Designation.

columns.name: EQUIP_MAX_GROSS_WT
columns.description: The maximum permissible weight of the equipment and the load.

columns.name: EQUIP_MAX_GROSS_WT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure associated with the equipment's gross maximum weight.

columns.name: EQUIP_MAX_GROSS_WT_BASE
columns.description: The equipment's gross maximum weight of the equipment in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: FLOOR_HEIGHT
columns.description: Actual height of the platform or floor above the ground or the rail.

columns.name: FLOOR_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure associated with the floor height.

columns.name: FLOOR_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The floor height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_HEIGHT
columns.description: When empty, indicates the height from Top of Rail to the Center of Gravity.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure associated with the empty center of gravity height.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The empty center of gravity height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: DRY_CAPACITY
columns.description: The maximum interior capacity of the equipment.

columns.name: DRY_CAPACITY_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure associated with the maximum dry capacity of the equipment.

columns.name: DRY_CAPACITY_BASE
columns.description: The maximum dry capacity in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: LIQUID_CAPACITY
columns.description: The number of gallons the equipment will hold.

columns.name: LIQUID_CAPACITY_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure associated with the liquid capacity of the equipment.

columns.name: LIQUID_CAPACITY_BASE
columns.description: The liquid capacity in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: ASSIGNED_PRODUCT
columns.description: N/A

columns.name: CAR_DESTINATION_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Specifies destination for the car.

columns.name: CAR_DESTINATION_ETA_DATE
columns.description: This is the estimated arrival time at the car destination.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_LENGTH
columns.description: When empty, length wise position of center of gravity from the equipment bottom leftmost corner.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The empty center of gravity length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the empty center of gravity length column.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_WIDTH
columns.description: When empty, width wise position of center of gravity from the equipment bottom leftmost corner.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The empty center of gravity length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: EMPTY_CG_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the empty center of gravity width column.

columns.name: LOAD_OR_EMPTY
columns.description: Indicates whether the equipment is Load or Empty or Unknown (default)

columns.name: SIGHTING_EVT_SC_GID
columns.description: Sighting event represents the current status code of the equipment.

columns.name: PREV_SIGHTING_EVT_SC_GID
columns.description: Previous sighting event represents the previous status code of the equipment.

columns.name: DIVISION_NAME
columns.description: This is the Business Division name field for part of the organization that is responsible for the asset and the business.

columns.name: CUSTOMER_FLEET
columns.description: This is a more granular field for the organization to specify the customer assignment as the customer wishes. It will identify product, location, customer, or any combination.

columns.name: REPORTING_RR_SCAC
columns.description: This is to report the Railroad Reporting SCAC code that provided the last event. It is copied in an agent action called UPDATE SIGHTING.

columns.name: PREV_REPORTING_RR_SCAC
columns.description: This is the previous Reporting SCAC.  The UPDATE ACTION moves the current value to the previous value before overwriting the current value.

columns.name: RELEASE_DATE
columns.description: Every time a car is released, this field is updated by a customer controlled agent action.  It is used to dynamically calculate in-transit time.

columns.name: ARRIVE_DATE
columns.description: Every time a car arrives, a customer controlled agent action will populate this. It is used to dynamically calculate the dwell time.

columns.name: ORDER_SOURCE
columns.description: This is a customer determined field based on an agent action.  Most likely the customer will populate an abbreviated version of the city and state.

columns.name: ORDER_DESTINATION
columns.description: This is a customer determined field based on an agent action.  Most likely the customer will populate an abbreviated version of the city and state.

columns.name: ORDER_CUSTOMER_NAME
columns.description: This is a customer determined field based on an agent action.  Most likely the customer will populate an abbreviated version of the consignee.

columns.name: TRUCK_CENTER_LENGTH
columns.description: The length between the centers of the two truck/bogie systems. Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: TRUCK_CENTER_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The length between the centers of the two truck/bogie systems in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TRUCK_CENTER_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the length between the centers of the two truck/bogie systems

columns.name: TRUCK_COUNT
columns.description: The total number of trucks/bogies on the equipment. Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: TOTAL_AXLE_COUNT
columns.description: The total number of axles on the equipment. Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: MAX_AXLE_WEIGHT
columns.description: Maximum allowed axle weight. Applicable only to rail cars.

columns.name: MAX_AXLE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Maximum allowed axle weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: MAX_AXLE_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the maximum allowed axle weight.
